checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/release-name-smartctl-exporter' should be added.

Capability "CHOWN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-smartctl-exporter.allow-capability-chown: SomeReason'.

Capability "DAC_OVERRIDE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-smartctl-exporter.allow-capability-dac-override: SomeReason'.

Capability "FOWNER" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-smartctl-exporter.allow-capability-fowner: SomeReason'.

Capability "SETGID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-smartctl-exporter.allow-capability-setgid: SomeReason'.

Capability "SETUID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-smartctl-exporter.allow-capability-setuid: SomeReason'.
runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
allowPrivilegeEscalation set to 'true'. It should be set to 'false'.
privileged is set to 'true' in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'false'.
